api_key_invalid:
Invalid API key.

Solution:
- Check your settings with /config
- Verify your API key at https://console.anthropic.com
api_key_invalid_format: Invalid Anthropic API key format (must start with sk-ant-)
api_authentication_failed:
Authentication failed.

Solution:
- Verify your API key is correct
- Check if your API key has expired
api_rate_limit:
Too many requests.

Solution:
- Please wait a moment and try again (about 1 minute)
api_quota_exceeded:
API usage quota exceeded.

Solution:
- Check your usage at https://console.anthropic.com
- Consider upgrading your plan if needed
network_error:
Network connection problem.

Solution:
- Check your internet connection
- Verify VPN or proxy settings
timeout_error:
Request timed out.

Solution:
- Check your network connection
- Please try again in a moment
server_error:
Server is experiencing temporary issues.

Solution:
- Please try again in a moment
- If the problem persists, check https://status.anthropic.com
error_occurred:
Error occurred: {{message}}

If the problem persists, check your settings or restart the app.
file_not_found_detail: The specified file does not exist. Please check the file path.
permission_denied_detail: You don't have permission to access this file or directory. Check file permissions or run with administrator privileges.
disk_space_detail: No space left on disk. Please free up some space by deleting unnecessary files.
path_too_long_detail: The file path exceeds system limits. Please use a shorter path.
directory_not_found_detail: The specified directory does not exist. Please check the directory path.
file_exists_detail: A file with the same name already exists. Use a different name or delete the existing file.
read_error_detail: An error occurred while reading the file. The file may be corrupted or in use by another program.
write_error_detail: An error occurred while saving the file. Please check disk space and write permissions.
access_denied_detail: Access outside the notes directory is not allowed for security reasons.
config_not_found_detail: GigaMind settings file not found. Please run 'gigamind config' to set up initial configuration.
config_parse_error_detail: The settings file (config.yaml) format is invalid. Please check the YAML syntax.
config_invalid_value_detail: The settings file contains invalid values. Please check and correct your settings.
config_missing_api_key_detail: Anthropic API key is required. Please run 'gigamind config' or set the ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable.
config_notes_dir_not_found_detail: The configured notes directory does not exist. Please run 'gigamind config' to set the correct path.
subagent_unknown_detail: Unknown subagent. Available agents: search-agent, note-agent, clone-agent
subagent_execution_failed_detail: An error occurred during subagent execution. Please check the logs or try again.
subagent_timeout_detail: The subagent task exceeded the time limit. Try breaking the request into smaller parts.
subagent_tool_failed_detail: An error occurred with a tool used by the subagent.
subagent_max_iterations_detail: The subagent reached the maximum iteration count. Please make your request more specific.
subagent_not_initialized_detail: The subagent has not been initialized. Please verify that the API key is configured.
recovery_api_key: Run gigamind config to reconfigure your API key.
recovery_rate_limit: Wait about 1 minute and try again.
recovery_quota: Upgrade your plan in the Anthropic console.
recovery_timeout: Try breaking your request into smaller parts.
recovery_context_length: Start a new session or reduce the conversation length.
recovery_permission: Check file permissions or run with administrator privileges.
recovery_notes_dir: Run gigamind config to reconfigure your notes folder.
recovery_max_iterations: Try making your request more specific.
notInitialized: GigaMind is not initialized. Run 'gigamind init' first.
rateLimitExceeded: API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
model_unavailable: The requested AI model is not available.
model_unavailable_detail: The specified AI model cannot be used. Please select a different model in settings or try again later.
context_too_long_detail: The conversation context exceeds the model's maximum token limit. Please start a new session or reduce the input.
